website_summaries.verdict: These color-friendly bulbs are perfectly fine for everyday use, but go with something else if you use dimmer switches.
pros: GE's line of "HD" light bulbs offer rich-looking colors across the board, especially from the "Reveal" LED
cons: All of the bulbs flickered a little more than the average LED when used with dimmer switches, and none of them dimmed down any lower than 10 percent
The Reveal LED isn't bright enough to call itself a 60-watt replacement, but it calls itself one, anyway

customer_reviews.title: These are definitely nothing like the old incandescent Reveal bulbs
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely nothing like the old incandescent Reveal bulbs. Yes, the light is clear, but there is no warmth to them. I prefer a warmer light in the bathroom, especially when I’m putting on makeup.
customer_reviews.author: S C

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bulbs I've found after trying so many. The light color is perfect; everything looks natural without any greenish/yellowish tint you get with most others. Don't get too caught up in the 2850K spec. It's the quality/tint of the light that is important - these are simply white without the green/yellow tint. I wish they would pick a lumen rating and stick with it. So far I've purchased the "same" bulb and had 570, 650, 680 and 800 lumens. Luckily they all have the same nice color and the output difference isn't as big as it sounds on paper.
customer_reviews.author: mjamazon

customer_reviews.title: Too harsh for a dining room, off color when dimmed
customer_reviews.text: At full power, these LED lights are blindingly bright white and too harsh for say, a dining ,or breakfast room chandelier. Maybe good for recessed kitchen lamps. When they are dimmed, they take on a sickly greenish hue...not Reveal white color thru the dimmer range. They are brighter (650L) than 60 watt incandescents (560L). My wife hated them and I ended up buying Sylvania Clarity 60 watt incandescent clear ceiling fan bulbs. Now I gotta sell 10 of these GE's. I did not want to purchase any more GE Reveal incandescents because I experienced poor quality and short lifetime the last few yearts.
customer_reviews.author: RichR49

customer_reviews.title: One is already out lol
customer_reviews.text: One of the bulbs has already gone out after only 3 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: J-Rod

customer_reviews.title: Great color buy the brighter option
customer_reviews.text: Love the color of light these put out, but probably should have bought the 100 watt option. These seem a little less bright then the standard 60watt bulbs I replaced
customer_reviews.author: hoffman associates inc

customer_reviews.title: Was very disappointed, Will be returning
customer_reviews.text: These literally did the opposite of what they advertised. Light was visibly yellow compared to the bulbs I had it. Says “whites will appear whiter” but it literally gave everything in the room a yellow hue. In the picture you can see this bulb on the left. Was very disappointed, Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My absolute favorite bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the color of these bulbs. They make everything in my rooms look better. They do tint slightly pink instead of yellow as other reviewers have mentioned which I didn’t think would be something I would like but actually is nice. They also dim well and seem high quality. I have been switching most of the bulbs in my house over to these except a few rooms (kitchen, laundry) that I like to have at 3500 kelvins. They do trade off some brightness for color rendering quality but they are still way more than bright enough to light up even the larger rooms in my house.
customer_reviews.author: GVM

customer_reviews.title: Really like the soft glow of this bulb however one of ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like the soft glow of this bulb however one of the bulbs didn't work out of the box. Was hoping to have both of my buffet lamps working tonight :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: still an orange light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the packaging; "brightest whites" and brilliant colors" and the blue labels. I bought some store brand dimmable LED bulbs and my wife did not like the "orange-ish" color. She like s the bright white almost blue colored bulbs, hence why I bought these. but alas these bulbs are still orange. But they work very well inside my enclosed fixtures and the dimming feature is very nice. I will search for the color bulbs we want but these will still get used in other fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: c.j.travisTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: GE LED Bulbs are great
customer_reviews.text: GE LED Relax Bulbs are great. The packaging not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Dorgi Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good bulb but...
customer_reviews.text: So nice bulb.. works well.. brite at 100% however... does not dim all the way and is NOT as good as the original incandescent reveal bulb ( that had the kind of purple tint to them) sure wish GE could replicate that some how... PLEASE PLEASE keep working on it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill E

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, good color (slightly artificial though), works fine
customer_reviews.text: The overall light color is okay but still looks a little artificial compared to an incandescent bulb. Also quite bright, noticeably brighter than the equivalent wattage incandescent bulbs they replaced. (In our case, with 3 per fixture, 6 bulbs total in the bathroom, it's actually a little TOO bright now.) That's not a fault of the bulb per se. Overall they're still quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: Stark white light and THEY FLICKER!!
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are horrible. The light is a very stark white ... too white. Nothing like the old incandescent reveals. Sure you'll save some money... but the worst of it is THEY FLICKER. Bad bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Great for Photo Lighting
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for a DIY photo setup. They're super bright and don't distort colors. The only downside is that they produce a LOT of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: After buying a month ago, already have a lightbulb ...
customer_reviews.text: After buying a month ago, already have a lightbulb that has burnt out. To be clear the bulb buzzes loudly for weeks then fizzles out. Tried the bulb in several lamps to make sure it was not the lamp. It is the bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Bl1986

customer_reviews.title: I just love these lightbulbs
customer_reviews.text: Everyone has a preference when it comes to LED lights. I've been using the GE Reveal line of bulbs from incandescent, through compact fluorescent, and now LEDs. In my experience they deliver the most pleasing spectrum of light of any LED bulbs I've tried. They are not cheap, but are definitely worth it. They also last - I've been using these LEDs for years not and have not had one die on me yet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Too Warm
customer_reviews.text: I have GE Refresh lights which give off almost a greenish tinge, but are brighter than the warm yellow lights I had. I was under the impression that these GE Reveal lights were supposed to be even whiter, but they are not. They are a warm white. Not suitable for the room. If I had wanted a warm light I would not have chosen a light that promised "whiter whites". Instead I have yellower whites.
customer_reviews.author: Ang N

customer_reviews.title: NICE  COLOR RENDERING LED BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Always preferred the GE "Reveal" lightbulbs for their color rendering, and these LED's do not disappoint in that respect, but if the application is in a fixture on a dimmer that's relatively close to your ear (ie, less than 1-2ft), you may notice a subtle & persistent buzz like a small fly or mosquito that only dissipates at full brightness setting. Had to return the ones that were for use on a dimmer switch, but kept the others used in a fixed on/off lamp.
customer_reviews.author: DESERT-TEK

customer_reviews.title: Quality LED bulb
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely a quality product that appear well made and give off a nice warm light. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Barry PDX

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like the good old incandescent ge reveals. Color is much different. Dimming range is horribble and randomly flickers with compatible lutron dimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as any led, nice color, guess a 5 year half life with low use
customer_reviews.text: You know, none of these things last anywhere near as long as claimed. This one is no worst. I have about 10 of these in vanity mirrors etc. Since you can see the bulb and I want the color to match, I replaced to dead ones with the same model. I had tungston bulbs last this long. Cannot give any led bulb very high marks. Really like the spectrum if this one.
customer_reviews.author: DHueber

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS for product, 1 star for packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the box of bulbs I discovered the two led bulbs were just lying there without any support holding them secure. They both work but for how long. Probably damaged from all the tossing around during shipping. On a positive note I love the warm glow of the reveal HD 2850K bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Omg these were a life saver. All the bulbs in my apartment are that stupid, dull yellow color and it was almost impossible to get work done Efficiently and stay alert in that lighting. These gave off a great bright light that I can easily concentrate and work in without straining. Should’ve bought these sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Shai

customer_reviews.title: Works great, bright, and soft
customer_reviews.text: I am really surprised with how how bright and soft these are at the same time . I had to replace the bulbs in my bedroom and I’m glad I got theses . I haven’t seen any fluctuations in the lights when they are on . They seem to be great quality compared to the last 2 I had in
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Was I really even seeing before these?
customer_reviews.text: I like these way more than I even anticipated I would. Replaced my bathroom lights with these bulbs and I feel like I missed so much with the ones I had before. Great crisp, bright, pure white light. Will eventually get some for the whole house especially where we spend time reading.
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this color and the warm ambiance it gives the room. Replaced all bulbs in the house now!
customer_reviews.author: Tifgmu2003

customer_reviews.title: Clarity! It's like wearing glasses for the first time...
customer_reviews.text: I used to have regular "Run of the mill" incandescent light bulbs, but I was attracted to the idea of a more economic and clear white light. I got these at some point and the difference is night and day. They last much much longer than incandescent light bulbs and produce not only much brighter, but cleaner white light. Perfect for working but not so good for use before going to bed as the warmer (more yellowish) light won't keep you as awake as these do.
customer_reviews.author: Ryley

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: People pick on these for being dim or pink, I love the light they put out. I have two of these in my living room. One in each lamp. The color is soft and relaxing without being orange. I could see not wanting to have just one in an overhead light or something, but in lamps they are amazing. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Brian Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Yellow in Hue
customer_reviews.text: This "Relax" is TOO YELLOW in Hue for my liking. I was looking to Replace the REVEAL BULBS they discontinued making. Need TRUE WHITE.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: The only light bulbs I use now !
customer_reviews.text: I have replaced all the bulbs I used to use with these. They don't get hot, so I never worry about fire or overheating lamps. Also the light is great - I am VERY sensitive to lights and get a headache with fluorescent lights. So these are now in my lamps and I keep the overhead off.
customer_reviews.author: BethNYC

customer_reviews.title: Amazon, replaced and then refunded, great service from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Replaced, defective because it is not dimmable even tho the box is labeled dimmable. The replacement set of bulbs were also defective in the same manner....not dimmable. Amazon was prompt in replacement and refund. They are always reliable when it comes to customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly the bulb I needed to solve my flickering and buzzing problems with my Lutron Caseta switches.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed.
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs worked for a few weeks. Then all of a sudden they turn off randomly. They aren't burnt out. The just don't turn on. I have no idea. No other bulbs in the same sockets have done this. Unacceptable. Especially for this price. My Wal-Mart brand work still with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Beadsbyalison

customer_reviews.title: 40% Fail Rate within 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look. Don't love ordering them again 20 months later. Fail rate within 2 years on all these GE reveal wattages seems to be about 40%. We have them throughout the house. This makes "13.7" years seem like false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Second bulb lastest only a few hours
customer_reviews.text: I love the brightness of these bulbs. I have a lamp with two reading lights. I put both bulbs in at the same time and the second one died after a few hours. And yes I did switch them and check to make sure it wasn't my lamp... I will buy these from Target from now on.. It is too much of a hassle to return when one works and the other was basically DOA. There should be a way to receive a placement.
customer_reviews.author: purrgirl

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I never write a negative review but this lightbulb is not how it is described. I do not recommend it and it is not bright.
customer_reviews.author: Rosy

customer_reviews.title: Second Review not so good.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color...not to yellow and not to white. It really set my lamp up perfectly. However one of the bulbs only lasted 9 months. It started going out at around 6 months as it wouldn't come on right away but would eventually come on. it finally died around Christmas. Certainly didn't last the years and years they advertise.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Mark C

customer_reviews.title: They don't require much power, good for off-grid use.
customer_reviews.text: I like that they don't suck much power, but I believe that the incandescent bulbs are still the best at creating proper light for crafts and reading. I use the bulb for reading my Bibles, and drawing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Moore

customer_reviews.title: color is great and I would have given 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: color is great and I would have given 5 stars, but after about 1 month I had one blinking at different brightness levels and it is definitely defective. Need to get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected yet...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by how bright these were. I got them for the bathroom in my apartment because I'm moving out and didn't care, but I am quite satisfied and heartily recommend them. I just have to say that I don't find them warm or relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: VirginianHannah

customer_reviews.title: Color is unsettling and different than other Reveal bulbs
customer_reviews.text: The primary issue with this bulb is the light temp/color, which was unsettling at best. We used the Reveal incandescent bulbs for years and have GE Reveal LED flood lights in our kitchen that have acceptable color, but these produce way too much purple/blue and everything that is white in the room shows this color. The best analogy would be a black light. This bulb also runs quite hot, but not as hot as others we've had from GE (e.g., the).
customer_reviews.author: a_reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very bright bulbs, but they flicker on a dimmer
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs do not work well on a dimmer. Do not immediately turn on, and then flicker when they are on. On the positive side, they are extremely bright white (a little too bright white for me).
customer_reviews.author: An/La

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: The hue provided by these bulbs is terrific. I have them in my dining room and it give the room a very nice glow. I especially like how it brings out the colors of the prints I have hanging on my walls.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny D.

customer_reviews.title: Rose colored glow
customer_reviews.text: If you want pink lights, get these. No kidding, my bedroom now has a pink reddish glow to it. So strange and not what I was going for.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah G.

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Bright Light...
customer_reviews.text: I love the warm glow, even though they are the warm glow they still put out a nice bright light. Works great with the dimmer
customer_reviews.author: Jason K

customer_reviews.title: Best lightbulbs ever!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these lightbulbs. For a 9 Watt bulb, it is able to light up and entire bedroom which I found to be great( considering I was using a floor lamp since ceiling lighting isn’t an option where I live. ) great value for money. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Yandra V

customer_reviews.title: No RFI or EMI from them
customer_reviews.text: Just a regular incandescent light bulb. The LED replacements are more energy efficient but the LED ones complety noise up the AM and FM radio making LED units unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F.

customer_reviews.title: Better light for above the bathroom sink
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are exactly what I was looking for. I wanted better skin color and illumination than my ordinary bulbs, and these replacements are real vanity-type bulbs. They make a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: No Accuracy
customer_reviews.text: They were send used. The white rim had dirt on it. I screwed it in the lamp it works not sure how long there going to last now being that someone used them and sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: veronica

customer_reviews.title: weird flicker and not always good at starting up
customer_reviews.text: sometimes the light doesn't turn on or seems like it's short circuiting. don't quite know why. but quality of light is nice!
customer_reviews.author: E. C. David

customer_reviews.title: its yellow bulb not a white LED as described
customer_reviews.text: I purchase a this bulb thinking it will be a bright white LED as described on the package, but instead they sent me a yellow bulb. I’m very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I can’t not say a negative thing about these lightbulbs! A great buy!!! Since I have changed over to GE LED lightbulbs our home is brighter. These bulbs do not get hot as other bulbs tend to heat up. I have seen a drop in my energy bill. I use these lightbulbs in closets kitchen and rooms and all these areas are better lit up.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Renteria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bathroom or kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are PERFECT for the bathroom while you put on makeup or in the kitchen while you cook. They’re very bright, so they’re not good for every room in the house. They recreate natural light.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyLauren101

customer_reviews.title: Works with light dimmer.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these lights specifically for a bathroom because the dimmer works with them. I'm very satisfied with them. The dimmer works not quite the same as an incandescent bulb, but it is satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: D. T. Love

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely  buy when needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for areas where I need really bright light light like my office or where i do arts and crafts and it's perfect super bright and gives out plenty of light
customer_reviews.author: Alus

customer_reviews.title: Warmer than expected.
customer_reviews.text: The light these give off is more yellow than the example photos would have you think. That being said, it’s not as muddy as most warm colors bulbs, so an overall improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Not white light
customer_reviews.text: when the bulb is on it emits a pink tinge, not white light, not what i wanted, but I'll keep for lamps.
customer_reviews.author: mckensie

customer_reviews.title: Light color is good. Ordered 4
customer_reviews.text: Light color is good. Ordered 4, needed 3. Within the first couple hours 1 burned out. Thankful I did have a replacement. Been installed for about 1 week. Remaining 3 seem ok. Will update in a few weeks on their status.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy (Lee) McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Make high pitch noise in dimmer switch - same locally purchased do not
customer_reviews.text: These make high pitch noises in my dimmer switch yet the same brand I bought locally do not. These must be defective.
customer_reviews.author: AZC

customer_reviews.title: Nicely packed, great price
customer_reviews.text: Not super bright, just the perfect lamp brightness in my opinion. And with led should last a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Color is nice, but they DO hum
customer_reviews.text: These hum in our house. I'm really disappointed that a lightbulb at this price point would. Also, we've had several go out in the year we've had them (3 out of the 12 I bought).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight compared to previous GE LED bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Excellent color but note, all plastic construction. No heat sink. Don't overpay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light for in kitchen/dining area.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect light for in the 9 bulb chandelier. Just right spectrum.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: These light bulbs were terrible. The color came off so yellow it killed my eyes. Gave me migraines everyday and I had to order new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen McGlinsey

customer_reviews.title: not as bright as I expected it to be
customer_reviews.text: This is not what I was expecting it to be. I thought it would be much brighter but it's not. I ended up keeping it for other lamps around my home and found bulbs out in town.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Yellow NOT White
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected, they illuminate yellow, not white. That isn’t a reason for a poor review, I just want to save others the hassle and disappointment. If you are expecting a white/daylight type bulb these are not for you.
customer_reviews.author: M&M Three

customer_reviews.title: Does not last more then 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Burned out after 2 months. Was supposed to last for years. Chinese crap.
customer_reviews.author: Digby

customer_reviews.title: Product isn't properly labeled for size
customer_reviews.text: The description of this product states that it is size A15. But, when received it was actually size A21. So, it was way to big for my ceiling fan fixtures. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Bulbs I've Tried So Far
customer_reviews.text: I'm picky about the way my light looks. These bulbs are the best I've seen so far. Colors look how they're supposed to look, and there's not that ugly yellow glow a lot of bulbs create.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: I liked these, but
customer_reviews.text: I liked these lights but I was hoping for a white light, these put our more of a yellow one. Bulbs are pretty heavy in weight as well.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It has that yellow/orange color light like the old bulbs. Placed them in the kitchen to give it that classic feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it .
customer_reviews.text: These lights are really dim. I thought they would be a lot brighter especially since it’s HD but they do get the job done .
customer_reviews.author: Deon Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Good price for these
customer_reviews.text: I was septics at first, but these are very bright and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: teacher one

customer_reviews.title: They're just like any other bulb
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a bright white light. These are not it.
customer_reviews.author: RTT: Guns & Gear

customer_reviews.title: Not for enclosed fixtures
customer_reviews.text: Not able to use in enclosed fixtures. They are bright though.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael-K

customer_reviews.title: Quality bulbs, great price, arrived in great shape.
customer_reviews.text: Bulbs work great. Bright and great price! Arrived with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: wrong description
customer_reviews.text: Says A15 but it is not, it's an A21 size
customer_reviews.author: G. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate box
customer_reviews.text: Not really the color advertised on the box. Kind of a purplish Hue instead of white as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: They are light bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: And God said let there be light!!! So I ordered these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bruemmer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These give a good amount of light without using a big amount of energy. I just wish they were longer for canned ceiling lights.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Beauregard

customer_reviews.title: These bulbs are an investment.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah I find myself taking my bulbs now with me every time I move.
customer_reviews.author: GruffDan

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, they do a great job of revealing accurate color. I really like the light and wish I could find them in a higher wattage (75w).
customer_reviews.author: Russell Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great Bathroom Lights
customer_reviews.text: Switched the bulbs in my studio apartment bedroom to these and love them!! So much better for makeup application.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Only bulbs we use!!
customer_reviews.text: Best bulbs ever! Great hue!! And they’re LED. Best of both worlds!
customer_reviews.author: Brook Sternberg

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lights - Very Bright
customer_reviews.text: I like the color temperature of them a lot. They're very bright when I used 3 in my bathroom. Next time, I'll go down to the 40-watt equivalent.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Herman

customer_reviews.title: Reveals natural colors in my home
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this bulb brings out the color in my home especially the natural wood floors and trim
customer_reviews.author: RBW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light!
customer_reviews.text: Lighting is super important for what I do and these bulbs are very bright. Glad I bought them because my apartment was dim and it was driving me nuts!
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Small

customer_reviews.title: Love Reveal!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to use Reveal bulbs! I've been spoiled by the way it enhances the true colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: By far my eyes favorite lighting
customer_reviews.text: These are so great on my eyes. Soft yet crisp and inviting.
customer_reviews.author: Lou A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and bright true to life light. Love these bulbs. No more yellow tint to everything.
customer_reviews.author: The Sho's

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan for one of the pair
customer_reviews.text: They had a really good color, but one lasted about 3 months without much use.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: ... installed these in my bathroom and now it is super bright and doesnt have that nasty yellow tinge
customer_reviews.text: I installed these in my bathroom and now it is super bright and doesnt have that nasty yellow tinge
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Buzzing after one year of use.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bulb for over a year now. Two of them start buzzing after one year of use and I had to replace them. So the promised savings over energy use never materialize.
customer_reviews.author: Saihung Lo

customer_reviews.title: Nice color,  brighter than other bulbs
customer_reviews.text: A very nice, daylight type color. Not red or blue, but a middle color.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup light
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for overhead makeup application. May need a Light directly in front to perfect application
customer_reviews.author: allison janas

customer_reviews.title: Terrific for living room floor lamp.
customer_reviews.text: I used these to replace two 100 watt incandescent bulbs in my floor lamp in the living room. The light is natural-looking, soft and bright and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Kate O

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid bulbs, but heavier than other GE leds that I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Color is way off
customer_reviews.text: The color from these bulbs is nowhere near 2850K, they cast a nasty blue-ish purple hue. To my eye they are way off black body (incandescent). I'd love to see the spectrum plot for these. I can't recommend buying these unless I had a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: won't last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several of these for 2 different homes in 4 total bathrooms. 3 of the bulbs in 3 different light fixtures have stopped working. The bulbs may be a knock off. very disapounted.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Guerard

customer_reviews.title: Best price I found on this two pack
customer_reviews.text: Needed two bulbs for a bathroom fixture and this fit my needs very well.
customer_reviews.author: Flier

product_meta.title: GE Lighting Relax LED HD 10.5-watt (60-watt Replacement), 800-Lumen A19 Light Bulb with Medium Base, Soft White, 2-Pack - 96685
product_meta.description: Color:Soft White| Size:2 Pack| Style:60-WattGE High Definition bulbs are an improved, energy-saving LED that enhance the appearance of colors. Experience the difference with bolder colors and enhanced contrast vs. standard GE LED bulbs. Relax HD light offers a warm, soft white light perfect for comfortable moments and cozy spaces. Use relax HD light in spaces like bedrooms, family rooms and dining rooms. Install relax HD LED general purpose bulbs in table lamps, sconces and open fixtures.
feature_bullets: Relax HD light offers a warm, soft white light perfect for comfortable moments and cozy spaces
